Title: Nabab
Writer: Pele Bhattacharya (dialogue), Pele Bhattacharya (screenplay), Pele Bhattacharya, Joydip Mukherjee (dialogue), Joydip Mukherjee (screenplay)
Actors: Shakib Khan, Subhasree Ganguly, Aparajita Adhya, Biswanath Basu
Plot: An intelligence agent from Bangladesh tasked with a secret operation in West Bengal, India.
